Text: There is no sound after firts sceen.
Don't bother. Sound is weird, it sounds like when you have water in your ear.

Ignore the comments about the sound being problematic - it is fine.

The DVD menus are Spanish and the audio defaults to really bad quality dubbed Spanish, but select the English soundtrack and all is clear.

Also there is definitely sound all the way through.

@bwx0: Thanks for the very useful information!
@Cruzman3608: Typical DVD-5 size.
Old films are often not that big in file size. And this one's from 1986.
